actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the transfer of jurisdiction of certain lands in the National Park System located in Montgomery County, Md.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to transfer the jurisdiction of specified lands (designated as "Proposed Relocation MacArthur Boulevard") in the National Park System, located in Montgomery County, Maryland, for purposes of road improvement.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the transfer of jurisdiction of certain lands in the National Park System located in Montgomery County, Md.
